definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
lit. on brocade, add flowers (idiom); to decorate sth already perfect/gilding the lily
to buy/to acquire/to add to one's possessions
lit. like a tiger that has grown wings/with redoubled power (idiom)
lit. contribute bricks and tiles for a building (idiom)/fig. to do one's bit to help
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
lit. to add oil and vinegar/fig. adding details while telling a story (to make it more interesting)
to add a son to the family
to add interest (to a story)/to sex up
lit. one half equals zero point five (division rule in abacus reckoning)/to share fairly between two parties/to go fifty-fifty

sentences.english: Young heirs to future-hold, city grows more radiant.
sentences.chinese: 青年累代承未来，城市连年添华彩。

sentences.english: Added yet this above all, that he shut up John in prison.
sentences.chinese: 又另外添了一件，就是把约翰收在监里。

sentences.english: Install behind, was beautiful and charming and add seductive charm.
sentences.chinese: 成装上身后，既漂亮妩媚，又倍添诱人魅力。

sentences.english: I've got to appologize for troubling you so much.
sentences.chinese: 给你添了这么多麻烦，我得向你道歉。

sentences.english: Add justice to the fast-flung round of human endeavor and you have civilization.
sentences.chinese: 人类所做的种种努力之中添公正便成其为文明。

sentences.english: This is the opulence of the twin suites layout… a temple of your supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 豪华双套房设计，彰显豪迈气派，倍添矜贵身价。

sentences.english: Send to cup in hand Feng feather in front, the tone of the Yi breeze also joined heroism.
sentences.chinese: 将手中杯子送到凤羽面前，逸风的语气也添了豪气。

sentences.english: A cloth had been spread over a little round table on which was a vase of fragrant plum blossom.
sentences.chinese: 小圆桌铺上了台布，添了瓶盛开的腊梅，吐着幽香。

sentences.english: She oke as if she did not want to cause him any more trouble.
sentences.chinese: 她说话的口吻似乎表明她不想再给他添更多的麻烦。

sentences.english: Clever to give two people add a fire.
sentences.chinese: 曾聪明要给两人再添一把火。

sentences.english: I personally think they are slightly better than even the fresh sushi market in SOGO Basement.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得仲好过祟光地库个寿司市场添。

sentences.english: Her illness added to the family's troubles.
sentences.chinese: 她的病给家人添了麻烦。

sentences.english: The artist inked in the upper part of the picture with a tree.
sentences.chinese: 画家在画的上部空白处添了一棵树。

sentences.english: A:A thousand pardons for having given you so much trouble.
sentences.chinese: 给你添这么多的麻烦，抱歉，抱歉。

sentences.english: We have covered insurance on these goods for 10% above the invoice value against all risks.
sentences.chinese: 我们未将此货按发票金额添10%投了综合险。

definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting
Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)
